item.title: Pasta al Limone with Brown Butter Scallops
item.description: This vibrant lemon pasta gets an indulgent upgrade with perfectly seared scallops finished in nutty brown butter. It’s light, luxurious, and packed with flavor in every bite.

media:content.media:title: Pasta al Limone with Brown Butter Scallops
media:content.media:description: This vibrant lemon pasta gets an indulgent upgrade with perfectly seared scallops finished in nutty brown butter. It’s light, luxurious, and packed with flavor in every bite.

item.title: Homemade Marshmallows and Hot Chocolate for the Coziest Sunday
item.description: Soft, pillowy marshmallows melt into a mug of creamy hot chocolate for the ultimate cozy treat. This homemade version elevates a classic comfort drink into something extra special.

media:content.media:title: Homemade Marshmallows and Hot Chocolate for the Coziest Sunday
media:content.media:description: Soft, pillowy marshmallows melt into a mug of creamy hot chocolate for the ultimate cozy treat. This homemade version elevates a classic comfort drink into something extra special.

item.title: The Perfect Post-Valentine’s Breakfast: Berry Cream Cheese Danishes
item.description: After the chocolates and candlelight, start the next morning with something just as special. These berry cream cheese danishes are flaky, lightly sweet, and ideal for a cozy, slow breakfast.

media:content.media:title: The Perfect Post-Valentine’s Breakfast: Berry Cream Cheese Danishes
media:content.media:description: After the chocolates and candlelight, start the next morning with something just as special. These berry cream cheese danishes are flaky, lightly sweet, and ideal for a cozy, slow breakfast.

item.title: A Heart-Shaped Cake Made for Your Valentine
item.description: This heart-shaped cake is a simple yet thoughtful way to celebrate Valentine’s Day. Soft, sweet, and beautifully decorated, it’s the kind of homemade dessert that makes the occasion feel extra special.
